abstract: Citigroup plans to sell Nikko Asset Management separately, not bundled with Nikko Cordial Securities as previously speculated, the Nikkei financial daily said.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup plans to sell Nikko Asset Management separately, not bundled with Nikko Cordial Securities as previously speculated, the Nikkei financial daily said.

headline.main: Citi to Sell Nikko Asset Separately, Report Says
